name: MaroonDoor
tag_list: real-estate, social-networking, homeowners, homeowner-associations, realtors, buildings, hoa, condos, networking, andrew-hillman
overview:
MaroonDoor.com is a social utility platform that empowers Homeowners with online tools so they can easily create Homeowner Association network sites. Since HOA’s are often dysfunctional MaroonDoor.com is looking to strengthen communication between neighbors by bringing the lifestyle online. MaroonDoor.com isn’t just for Homeowners, Real Estate Professionals can put themselves in front on these Homeowners and start branding by creating their own fully customized Profile page. They can network with other Real Estate Professionals and/or Homeowners who may have questions about their situations and local market.

HOA’s are fully customizable and have a variety of useful features: upload HOA documents, schedule and plan events, private messaging, photos, forums, videos etc.

User profiles (Homeowner & Real Estate Professional) can also be fully customized. Profiles contain all the basic functions of a social network: designing, messaging, photos, commenting, blogging, etc.

external_links.title: MaroonDoor.com Real Estate Social Network for Homeowners and Real Estate Professionals
